DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to compare the efficacy of Endostar/cisplatin with cisplatin alone or Endostar alone in patients with malignant pleural effusion or ascites.
DOC.brief_title: Endostar and/or Cisplatin for Treatment of Malignant Pleural Effusion or Ascites
